game.name: Goldilock One: The Mists of Jakaira
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 생존 요소가 있는 액션 RPG. 자원을 관리하고 NPC와 유대감을 형성해 제작을 해제하고 동료를 얻으세요. 일부는 조작 가능한 캐릭터가 되어 퍼즐을 풀고 전투를 함께합니다. 얼어붙은 황야에서 살아남고 유배의 진실을 밝혀내세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Action RPG with survival elements. Manage resources and bond with NPCs to unlock crafting and gain allies who may become playable. Use them to solve puzzles and battle together. Survive the frozen wilds and uncover the truth behind your exile.
